 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּת‎</span> **verb** very dubious; only in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָדַעַת לָעוּת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתיָֿעֵף דָּבָר‎</span> [[Isa.50.4|Isa 50:4]] usually ***to help***, so [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] Del [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Ry|Ry]]<sup>Kau</sup> and others, but in that case an Aramaism (Aramaic \*<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עות‎</span> = Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, q. v. below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּשׁ‎</span>); text probably corrupt, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Oort|Oort]]<sup>ThT 1891, 469</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעִתּוֺ‎</span>, and strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתיָֿעֵף‎</span>; [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Comm.</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִרְעוֺת‎</span> '***teach, edify***,' [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעֲנוֺת‎</span>, [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt.</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַחֲיוֺת‎</span>.
